metadata.methodology: ONLY measurable predictions with specific targets, deadlines, and verifiable outcomes

rules.1: Must have specific target (price, percentage, yes/no event)
rules.3: Must be verifiable (can objectively determine right/wrong)

pundits.name: Balaji Srinivasan
pundits.bio: Entrepreneur, angel investor, and tech philosopher. Former CTO of Coinbase and General Partner at a16z.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $1,000,000 within 90 days
predictions.quote: I will mass $1M bet that Bitcoin will hit $1M in 90 days.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin was at ~$27,000 on June 17, 2023. Balaji paid the bet.

predictions.claim: Major US banks will fail within 6 weeks
predictions.quote: Banks are going to fail. Many of them. This is the beginning of a banking crisis.
predictions.outcome_notes: SVB, Signature Bank, and First Republic all failed in March-May 2023.

predictions.claim: More crypto companies will collapse after FTX within 3 months
predictions.quote: This is going to ripple through the entire industry. Many more will fall.
predictions.outcome_notes: BlockFi, Genesis, Voyager collapsed following FTX.

pundits.name: Jim Cramer
pundits.bio: Host of CNBC's Mad Money. Former hedge fund manager. Known for his stock picks and market calls.

predictions.claim: SVB Financial will NOT collapse
predictions.quote: Silicon Valley Bank is fine. Don't worry about it.
predictions.outcome_notes: SVB collapsed 2 days later - largest bank failure since 2008

predictions.claim: Nvidia stock will decline from current levels by Q1 2024
predictions.quote: Nvidia has had an incredible run but I think it's time to ring the register.
predictions.outcome_notes: NVDA went from ~$450 to ~$900 (+100%)

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will end 2024 higher than it started
predictions.quote: I'm bullish on 2024. This is going to be a good year.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will NOT drop more than 20% due to coronavirus
predictions.quote: This is not going to tank the market. People are overreacting.
predictions.outcome_notes: Market crashed 35% in March 2020

predictions.claim: Bear Stearns will NOT fail
predictions.quote: Bear Stearns is fine. Do not take your money out.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bear Stearns collapsed 5 days later, bought by JPM for $2/share

predictions.claim: Peloton stock will be higher in 6 months
predictions.quote: Peloton is oversold. This is an opportunity to buy.
predictions.outcome_notes: Peloton fell another 80% after recommendation

predictions.claim: Netflix stock will be higher by end of H1 2022
predictions.quote: Netflix is the king of streaming. Buy Netflix.
predictions.outcome_notes: Netflix crashed 70% in first half of 2022

pundits.name: Cathie Wood
pundits.bio: Founder, CEO & CIO of ARK Invest. Known for disruptive innovation investing and bold price targets.

predictions.claim: Tesla will reach $3,000 per share by end of 2026
predictions.quote: Our price target for Tesla is $3,000 by 2026.
predictions.outcome_notes: Tesla currently ~$250. Needs 12x to hit target.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $1,000,000 by end of 2030
predictions.quote: We believe Bitcoin could reach $1 million by 2030.
predictions.outcome_notes: Long-term prediction still pending

predictions.claim: US CPI will go negative (deflation) by Feb 2024
predictions.quote: We believe deflation is the bigger risk, not inflation. Prices will come down.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation fell to ~3% but never went negative

pundits.name: Peter Schiff
pundits.bio: Economist, author, and gold bug. Known for predicting the 2008 financial crisis.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will fall below $10,000 in 2022
predictions.quote: Bitcoin is heading much lower. I expect it to fall below $10,000.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin bottomed at ~$15,500, never went below $10k

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will go to zero by end of 2024
predictions.quote: FTX is just the beginning. Bitcoin is going to zero.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin recovered to all-time highs above $70,000

predictions.claim: Gold will outperform S&P 500 in 2023
predictions.quote: Gold is the place to be. It will crush stocks this year.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 up ~24% in 2023, Gold up ~13%

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will fall after ETF approval (sell the news)
predictions.quote: Sell the news. The Bitcoin ETF will be a disaster for the price.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin rallied to new ATH above $70k after ETF approval

pundits.name: Nate Silver
pundits.bio: Statistician, writer, and founder of FiveThirtyEight. Known for election forecasting.

predictions.claim: Republicans will win the House in 2022 midterms
predictions.quote: Republicans are favored to win the House. Our model gives them about 80% chance.
predictions.outcome_notes: Republicans won House 222-213

predictions.claim: Democrats will hold the Senate in 2022 midterms
predictions.quote: Democrats are slight favorites to hold the Senate. About 55% in our model.
predictions.outcome_notes: Democrats held Senate 51-49

predictions.claim: Biden approval will stay below 45% through midterms
predictions.quote: Biden's approval is stuck in the low 40s. I don't see it recovering before November.
predictions.outcome_notes: Biden approval remained 40-43% through midterms

pundits.name: Michael Saylor
pundits.bio: Executive Chairman of MicroStrategy. Bitcoin maximalist.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will never go below $30,000 again
predictions.quote: I don't think Bitcoin ever goes below $30,000 again.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin fell to ~$15,500 in November 2022

predictions.claim: MicroStrategy will NOT sell any Bitcoin by end of 2024
predictions.quote: We are not sellers. We will hold our Bitcoin forever.
predictions.outcome_notes: MicroStrategy has continued accumulating, never sold

predictions.claim: Bitcoin spot ETF will be approved by end of 2024
predictions.quote: 2023 is the year Bitcoin becomes mainstream. ETF approval is coming.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin ETF approved January 10, 2024

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will hit new all-time high (above $69k) in 2024
predictions.quote: Bitcoin is going to break through $69,000 and beyond this year.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin hit new ATH above $73,000 in March 2024

pundits.name: Paul Krugman
pundits.bio: Nobel Prize-winning economist. NYT columnist.

predictions.claim: US inflation will be below 4% by end of 2022
predictions.quote: Inflation will come down significantly by year end. This is transitory.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation was 6.5% at end of 2022

predictions.claim: US will NOT have a recession in 2022
predictions.quote: I don't see a recession this year. The economy is fundamentally strong.
predictions.outcome_notes: US avoided technical recession in 2022

predictions.claim: US will have a recession in 2023
predictions.quote: I think a recession in 2023 is more likely than not at this point.
predictions.outcome_notes: US economy grew 2.5% in 2023, no recession

pundits.name: Larry Summers
pundits.bio: Former US Treasury Secretary. Harvard Professor. Known for early inflation warnings.

predictions.claim: Fed will raise rates above 4% by end of 2022
predictions.quote: The Fed is behind the curve. They will need to raise rates much more aggressively.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed raised rates to 4.25% by end of 2022

predictions.claim: US inflation will remain above 3% through end of 2023
predictions.quote: This inflation is not going away quickly. Expect elevated inflation through 2023.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation remained above 3% through 2023

predictions.claim: Fed will NOT cut rates before July 2024
predictions.quote: The Fed is not going to cut rates as quickly as markets expect.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed held rates at 5.25-5.50% through mid-2024

predictions.claim: US will avoid recession despite rate hikes through 2024
predictions.quote: A soft landing is possible. I don't think we need a severe recession.
predictions.outcome_notes: US achieved soft landing - inflation fell without recession

pundits.name: Elon Musk
pundits.bio: CEO of Tesla and SpaceX. Owner of X.

predictions.claim: Twitter acquisition will close at $54.20 per share
predictions.quote: My offer is my best and final offer. $54.20 per share.
predictions.outcome_notes: Deal closed at $54.20 in October 2022

predictions.claim: Tesla will have 1 million robotaxis on road by end of 2020
predictions.quote: I'm confident we'll have over a million robotaxis on the road.
predictions.outcome_notes: Zero robotaxis deployed by end of 2020

predictions.claim: Tesla will accept Bitcoin as payment permanently
predictions.quote: In retrospect, it was inevitable.
predictions.outcome_notes: Tesla reversed BTC acceptance in May 2021

pundits.name: Tom Lee
pundits.bio: Co-founder and Head of Research at Fundstrat.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will hit 5,100 by end of 2022
predictions.quote: We see S&P 500 reaching 5,100 by year end.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will reach 4,750 by end of 2023
predictions.quote: We think stocks will have a strong year. S&P 500 to 4,750.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 ended 2023 at 4,769

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will hit $150,000 in 2024
predictions.quote: We see Bitcoin reaching $150,000 this year with ETF inflows.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin reached ~$73k ATH, ended around $95k

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will make new all-time highs within 12 months
predictions.quote: We think markets make new highs within 12 months. Buy the dip.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 hit all-time highs by August 2020

pundits.name: Robert Kiyosaki
pundits.bio: Author of Rich Dad Poor Dad. Known for crash predictions.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will fall 50% from peak by May 2023
predictions.quote: Giant crash coming. Stocks could fall 50% or more.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 fell 25% at worst, then recovered

predictions.claim: US will enter depression (GDP decline >10%) in 2023
predictions.quote: Greatest depression ever coming in 2023.
predictions.outcome_notes: US economy grew 2.5% in 2023

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will fall to $9,000 by mid-2023
predictions.quote: Bitcoin going to $9,000. Great buying opportunity coming.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin bottomed at $15,500, never near $9,000

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will hit $120,000 by end of 2024
predictions.quote: Bitcoin going to $120,000. Buy now before it's too late.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin ended around $95k - not $120k

pundits.name: Bill Ackman
pundits.bio: Founder and CEO of Pershing Square Capital Management.

predictions.claim: Fed will cut rates by June 2023
predictions.quote: The Fed will cut rates sooner than people think.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed continued raising rates through 2023

predictions.claim: Netflix stock will double within 12 months
predictions.quote: Netflix has made the right changes. This stock is going much higher.
predictions.outcome_notes: Netflix stock doubled from ~$300 to ~$600

predictions.claim: Fed will cut rates in 2024 AND S&P 500 will end year up
predictions.quote: The Fed will cut rates in 2024. This will fuel a market rally.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed cut rates in Sept 2024, S&P 500 up ~25%

pundits.name: Ray Dalio
pundits.bio: Founder of Bridgewater Associates, the world's largest hedge fund.

predictions.claim: Stocks and bonds will outperform cash in 2022
predictions.quote: Cash is trash. You need assets that keep up with inflation.
predictions.outcome_notes: Cash outperformed stocks (-19%) and bonds (-13%) in 2022

predictions.claim: 2020 recession will be longer/deeper than 2008
predictions.quote: This is going to be worse than 2008. The economic damage is unprecedented.
predictions.outcome_notes: Recovery was fastest ever - V-shaped, ended in 2 months

predictions.claim: China GDP growth will exceed US GDP growth in 2024
predictions.quote: China's rise is inevitable. The relative decline of the US will continue.
predictions.outcome_notes: China ~5% growth vs US ~2.5% but China faced deflation crisis

pundits.name: Ben Bernanke
pundits.bio: Former Chairman of the Federal Reserve (2006-2014). Nobel Prize winner.

predictions.claim: Subprime mortgage problems will NOT spread to broader economy
predictions.quote: The impact on the broader economy and financial markets of the problems in the subprime market seems likely to be contained.
predictions.outcome_notes: Subprime crisis triggered worst financial crisis since Great Depression

predictions.claim: Federal Reserve does NOT forecast a recession in 2008
predictions.quote: The Federal Reserve is not currently forecasting a recession.
predictions.outcome_notes: Great Recession began December 2007 - already in recession when he said this

predictions.claim: Housing market will stabilize by late 2007
predictions.quote: We believe the effect of the troubles in the subprime sector on the broader housing market will be limited.
predictions.outcome_notes: Housing prices continued falling through 2012

pundits.name: Hank Paulson
pundits.bio: Former US Treasury Secretary (2006-2009). Former Goldman Sachs CEO.

predictions.claim: Financial system is fundamentally sound
predictions.quote: Our financial institutions, our banks and investment banks, are strong.
predictions.outcome_notes: Lehman collapsed 6 months later, multiple bailouts required

predictions.claim: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac are adequately capitalized
predictions.quote: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac are adequately capitalized. They are safe.
predictions.outcome_notes: Both placed in conservatorship 7 weeks later

pundits.name: Irving Fisher
pundits.bio: Famous American economist. Made infamous stock market prediction in 1929.

predictions.claim: Stock prices have reached a permanently high plateau
predictions.quote: Stock prices have reached what looks like a permanently high plateau.
predictions.outcome_notes: Market crashed 89% over next 3 years - worst crash in history

pundits.name: John McAfee
pundits.bio: Founder of McAfee antivirus. Crypto enthusiast. Made famous Bitcoin bet.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $500,000 by end of 2020
predictions.quote: If Bitcoin is not at $500,000 by the end of 2020, I will eat my own d*ck on national television.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin was ~$29,000 at end of 2020

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $1,000,000 by end of 2020
predictions.quote: I'm raising my bet. Bitcoin $1 million by 2020 or I will eat my own dick.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin was ~$29,000 at end of 2020 - 97% below target

pundits.name: Tim Draper
pundits.bio: Venture capitalist. Early Bitcoin investor. Founder of Draper Associates.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $10,000 by 2018
predictions.quote: In three years, Bitcoin will reach $10,000.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin hit $10,000 in November 2017, peaked at $19,000

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $250,000 by 2022
predictions.quote: Bitcoin will hit $250,000 by 2022.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin peaked at ~$69k in 2021, was ~$17k end of 2022

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $250,000 by mid-2025
predictions.quote: Bitcoin to $250,000 by early 2025. Institutions are coming.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin currently around $100k

pundits.name: Nouriel Roubini
pundits.bio: Dr. Doom. Economist who predicted 2008 crisis. Known crypto skeptic.

predictions.claim: US housing crash will cause severe recession
predictions.quote: The worst housing bust in the last 50 years will lead to a severe recession.
predictions.outcome_notes: Correctly predicted housing crash and Great Recession

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will crash to zero
predictions.quote: Bitcoin is the mother of all bubbles. It will crash to zero.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin survived, hit new ATH above $70k

predictions.claim: Crypto winter will lead to industry collapse within 2 years
predictions.quote: FTX is just the beginning. The entire crypto industry will implode.
predictions.outcome_notes: Crypto recovered, Bitcoin ETF approved, new all-time highs

predictions.claim: US faces double-dip recession in 2011
predictions.quote: There's a significant risk of a double-dip recession in the US.
predictions.outcome_notes: No double-dip recession occurred - economy continued recovering

pundits.name: David Rosenberg
pundits.bio: Chief Economist at Rosenberg Research. Former Merrill Lynch chief economist.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will fall to 3,000 in 2023
predictions.quote: We could see the S&P 500 hit 3,000 this year. The bottom is not in.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 never fell below 3,800, ended year at 4,769

predictions.claim: US recession will begin by Q3 2023
predictions.quote: Recession is coming in the second half of 2023. The data is clear.
predictions.outcome_notes: No recession in 2023 - economy grew 2.5%

predictions.claim: US recession will occur in 2024
predictions.quote: 2024 will be the year the recession finally hits.
predictions.outcome_notes: No recession in 2024 - soft landing achieved

pundits.name: Mike Wilson
pundits.bio: Chief Investment Officer at Morgan Stanley. Known for bearish calls.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will fall to 3,000 by mid-2023
predictions.quote: The bear market rally is over. We see S&P 500 falling to 3,000.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 was at 4,450 by mid-2023

predictions.claim: S&P 500 earnings will fall 16% in 2023
predictions.quote: Earnings are going to disappoint significantly this year.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 earnings grew slightly in 2023

pundits.name: Jeremy Grantham
pundits.bio: Co-founder of GMO. Known for identifying bubbles. Predicted 2000 and 2008 crashes.

predictions.claim: Tech stocks are in a bubble that will crash 50%+
predictions.quote: This is the biggest bubble in history. Tech stocks will crash.
predictions.outcome_notes: NASDAQ crashed 78% from peak

predictions.claim: Housing bubble will cause major financial crisis
predictions.quote: The housing market is in a serious bubble. This will end badly.
predictions.outcome_notes: Housing crash triggered Great Financial Crisis

predictions.claim: Current market is a superbubble that will crash 50%
predictions.quote: This is a genuine superbubble. We expect a crash of epic proportions.
predictions.outcome_notes: Market corrected 25% in 2022 but recovered to new highs in 2023

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will fall 45% from peak
predictions.quote: This bubble will burst and we'll see at least a 45% decline.
predictions.outcome_notes: Maximum decline was ~25%, then full recovery and new highs

pundits.name: Marc Faber
pundits.bio: Dr. Doom. Publisher of Gloom, Boom & Doom Report.

predictions.claim: US stocks will crash 20%+ within 12 months
predictions.quote: A 20% correction in the S&P 500 is coming.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 rose 24% over next 12 months

predictions.claim: Market crash coming - sell everything
predictions.quote: The market is extremely overbought. Sell everything.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 rose 17% over next 12 months

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will go to zero
predictions.quote: Bitcoin has no intrinsic value. It will eventually go to zero.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin survived and hit all-time highs

pundits.name: Gary Shilling
pundits.bio: Economic consultant. Known for deflation and bond bull predictions.

predictions.claim: US Treasury bonds will enter multi-decade bull market
predictions.quote: We're entering the bond rally of a lifetime.
predictions.outcome_notes: 40-year bond bull market - 10Y yield fell from 15% to 0.5%

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will fall 30% in 2023
predictions.quote: We expect a severe recession and 30% market decline.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 rose 24% in 2023

pundits.name: Henry Blodget
pundits.bio: Former Wall Street analyst. Founder of Business Insider. Known for dot-com calls.

predictions.claim: Amazon stock will reach $400 within 12 months
predictions.quote: Amazon is worth $400 per share. The potential is enormous.
predictions.outcome_notes: Amazon hit $400 (split-adjusted ~$100) within a year

predictions.claim: Internet stocks will continue rising through 2000
predictions.quote: The internet revolution is just getting started.
predictions.outcome_notes: NASDAQ crashed 39% in 2000 after March peak

pundits.name: Donald Trump
pundits.bio: 45th and 47th President of the United States. Known for bold economic and political claims.

predictions.claim: COVID-19 cases in the US will go down to near zero within days
predictions.quote: When you have 15 people, and the 15 within a couple of days is going to be down to close to zero, that's a pretty good job we've done.
predictions.outcome_notes: Cases exploded to thousands within weeks, pandemic declared

predictions.claim: Will win 2020 presidential election
predictions.quote: We're going to win. We're going to win big.
predictions.outcome_notes: Lost to Joe Biden 306-232 electoral votes

predictions.claim: Will win 2024 presidential election
predictions.quote: We're going to win in a landslide.
predictions.outcome_notes: Won 2024 election against Kamala Harris

predictions.claim: US GDP will grow at 4%+ annually
predictions.quote: We're going to have a lot of quarters like this. We could be in the 4's or maybe even the 5's.
predictions.outcome_notes: GDP growth averaged 2.3% in 2019, never sustained 4%+

pundits.name: Joe Biden
pundits.bio: 46th President of the United States. Former Vice President and Senator.

predictions.claim: Gas prices will come down significantly by end of summer
predictions.quote: By the end of the summer, the price of gas is going to be down.
predictions.outcome_notes: Gas prices dropped from $5+ to ~$3.70 by September

predictions.claim: Taliban will NOT take over Afghanistan quickly
predictions.quote: The likelihood there's going to be the Taliban overrunning everything and owning the whole country is highly unlikely.
predictions.outcome_notes: Taliban took Kabul within days, August 15, 2021

predictions.claim: Putin cannot remain in power
predictions.quote: For God's sake, this man cannot remain in power.
predictions.outcome_notes: Putin remained in power, re-elected in 2024

pundits.name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez
pundits.bio: US Representative for New York's 14th district. Progressive leader.

predictions.claim: World will end in 12 years without climate action
predictions.quote: The world is gonna end in 12 years if we don't address climate change.
predictions.outcome_notes: Deadline not yet reached

predictions.claim: Green New Deal will create millions of jobs
predictions.quote: We could create 20 million jobs with this green transition.
predictions.outcome_notes: Long-term prediction, GND not fully implemented

pundits.name: Stephen A. Smith
pundits.bio: ESPN sports commentator known for bold takes and predictions.

predictions.claim: Dallas Cowboys will win Super Bowl LVIII
predictions.quote: This is the Cowboys' year. They are going to the Super Bowl and winning it.
predictions.outcome_notes: Cowboys lost in Wild Card round to Packers

predictions.claim: Brooklyn Nets will win 2023 NBA Championship
predictions.quote: Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving are going to bring Brooklyn a championship.
predictions.outcome_notes: Nets were swept in first round, Durant traded

predictions.claim: 49ers will win Super Bowl LVIII
predictions.quote: San Francisco is the best team in football. They're winning it all.
predictions.outcome_notes: 49ers lost Super Bowl to Chiefs in overtime

predictions.claim: LeBron James Lakers will miss 2024 playoffs
predictions.quote: This Lakers team is not good enough. They're not making the playoffs.
predictions.outcome_notes: Lakers made playoffs through play-in tournament

pundits.name: Skip Bayless
pundits.bio: Sports commentator known for controversial takes, especially about LeBron James and Cowboys.

predictions.claim: Dallas Cowboys will win Super Bowl LVII
predictions.quote: This is finally the year. My Cowboys are going to win it all.
predictions.outcome_notes: Cowboys lost to 49ers in divisional round

predictions.claim: Dallas Cowboys will win Super Bowl LVIII
predictions.quote: Cowboys are winning the Super Bowl. Book it.
predictions.outcome_notes: Cowboys lost to Packers in Wild Card round

predictions.claim: Tom Brady will fail with Buccaneers
predictions.quote: Tom Brady is done. He's going to fail in Tampa.
predictions.outcome_notes: Brady won Super Bowl LV with Buccaneers

pundits.name: Pat Robertson
pundits.bio: Televangelist and founder of CBN. Known for prophecies and predictions.

predictions.claim: World will end in 1982
predictions.quote: I guarantee you by the end of 1982 there is going to be a judgment on the world.
predictions.outcome_notes: World did not end in 1982

predictions.claim: Tsunami will hit US coast in 2006
predictions.quote: God told me that in 2006 a tsunami will hit America's coastline.
predictions.outcome_notes: No tsunami hit US coast in 2006

predictions.claim: Romney will win 2012 election and serve 2 terms
predictions.quote: God told me who the next president would be. Romney wins and serves 8 years.
predictions.outcome_notes: Obama defeated Romney 332-206

pundits.name: Neil deGrasse Tyson
pundits.bio: Astrophysicist and science communicator. Director of Hayden Planetarium.

predictions.claim: Commercial space travel will be common by 2025
predictions.quote: Within 10 years, space tourism will be accessible to middle-class people.
predictions.outcome_notes: Space tourism exists but not yet 'middle-class accessible'

predictions.claim: Humans will land on Mars by 2035
predictions.quote: I'm confident we'll have humans on Mars by 2035 if we maintain current trajectory.
predictions.outcome_notes: Long-term prediction

pundits.name: Anthony Fauci
pundits.bio: Former director of NIAID. Chief medical advisor during COVID-19 pandemic.

predictions.claim: No need for healthy Americans to wear masks
predictions.quote: There's no reason to be walking around with a mask.
predictions.outcome_notes: CDC later recommended universal masking

predictions.claim: Pandemic will be controlled by Fall 2021 with vaccination
predictions.quote: If we get 70-85% vaccinated, we can have a relatively normal fall.
predictions.outcome_notes: Delta variant caused major fall surge despite vaccination

predictions.claim: Omicron wave will peak by end of January 2022
predictions.quote: I think we're going to see the peak of Omicron cases by late January.
predictions.outcome_notes: Omicron cases did peak in late January 2022 in most states

pundits.name: Boris Johnson
pundits.bio: Former UK Prime Minister (2019-2022). Led Brexit negotiations and COVID response.

predictions.claim: UK will get a great Brexit deal and keep full trade access to EU
predictions.quote: We will negotiate a great deal with the EU. We can have our cake and eat it.
predictions.outcome_notes: UK left single market with limited trade deal, significant barriers created

predictions.claim: Brexit deal will be done by October 31, 2019
predictions.quote: We will leave the EU on October 31st. Do or die.
predictions.outcome_notes: Brexit delayed until January 31, 2020

predictions.claim: UK will have COVID under control by Christmas 2020
predictions.quote: I am optimistic we can be significantly back to normal by Christmas.
predictions.outcome_notes: UK entered strict Tier 4 lockdown just before Christmas due to Alpha variant

predictions.claim: July 19 'Freedom Day' will be irreversible
predictions.quote: This will be an irreversible opening. We will not go backwards.
predictions.outcome_notes: Plan B restrictions reimposed in December 2021 due to Omicron

pundits.name: Nigel Farage
pundits.bio: Brexit Party/Reform UK leader. Key figure in Brexit campaign.

predictions.claim: Brexit will lead to UK economic boom
predictions.quote: Brexit will lead to an economic renaissance for Britain.
predictions.outcome_notes: UK economy underperformed G7 peers post-Brexit

predictions.claim: Trump will win 2020 US election
predictions.quote: I think Trump is going to win. The polls are wrong again.
predictions.outcome_notes: Biden won with 306 electoral votes

predictions.claim: Reform UK will win more seats than Lib Dems in 2024 election
predictions.quote: We're going to shock everyone. Reform will beat the Lib Dems.
predictions.outcome_notes: Lib Dems won 72 seats, Reform won 5 seats despite higher vote share

pundits.name: Emmanuel Macron
pundits.bio: President of France since 2017. Former investment banker and economy minister.

predictions.claim: French unemployment will drop below 7% by 2022
predictions.quote: By the end of my term, unemployment will be below 7%.
predictions.outcome_notes: French unemployment reached 7.4% by early 2022, then dropped below 7% in late 2022

predictions.claim: Pension reform will pass without major disruption
predictions.quote: The reform will go through. The French will understand its necessity.
predictions.outcome_notes: Massive strikes and protests, reform shelved due to COVID

predictions.claim: Russia will not invade Ukraine after diplomatic talks
predictions.quote: I believe we have made progress. An invasion is not a certainty.
predictions.outcome_notes: Russia invaded Ukraine 4 days later on February 24

predictions.claim: Will win re-election by comfortable margin
predictions.quote: I am confident the French people will renew their confidence in me.
predictions.outcome_notes: Macron won with 58.5% vs Le Pen's 41.5%

pundits.name: Narendra Modi
pundits.bio: Prime Minister of India since 2014. Leader of BJP party.

predictions.claim: India will become $5 trillion economy by 2024
predictions.quote: We will make India a $5 trillion economy by 2024.
predictions.outcome_notes: India's GDP was ~$3.5 trillion in 2024

predictions.claim: Demonetization will eliminate black money from economy
predictions.quote: Demonetization will end corruption and black money permanently.
predictions.outcome_notes: 99.3% of demonetized currency returned to banking system

predictions.claim: BJP will win 400+ seats in 2024 Lok Sabha elections
predictions.quote: Ab ki baar 400 paar (This time, 400+ seats).
predictions.outcome_notes: BJP won 240 seats, NDA coalition won 293 total

predictions.claim: BJP will retain all 4 state elections in late 2023
predictions.quote: BJP will sweep all four states. The opposition has nothing.
predictions.outcome_notes: BJP won Rajasthan, MP, Chhattisgarh; held Telangana

pundits.name: Javier Milei
pundits.bio: President of Argentina since 2023. Libertarian economist and political outsider.

predictions.claim: Will win Argentine presidential election in first round
predictions.quote: We're going to win in the first round. No runoff needed.
predictions.outcome_notes: Massa won first round, Milei won runoff in November

predictions.claim: Dollarization will happen within first year of presidency
predictions.quote: We will dollarize the economy. The peso will be eliminated.
predictions.outcome_notes: No dollarization occurred, focus shifted to currency competition

predictions.claim: Argentina inflation will drop to single digits within 18 months
predictions.quote: Inflation will be in single digits by mid-2025. Guaranteed.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation has dropped but still above 100% annually as of late 2024

predictions.claim: Central Bank will be abolished within 2 years
predictions.quote: The Central Bank is the source of inflation. It will be gone.
predictions.outcome_notes: Central Bank still operating as of late 2024

pundits.name: Lula da Silva
pundits.bio: President of Brazil (2003-2010, 2023-present). Workers' Party founder.

predictions.claim: Will win election in first round against Bolsonaro
predictions.quote: We will win in the first round. The polls show it clearly.
predictions.outcome_notes: Lula got 48%, Bolsonaro 43% - runoff required

predictions.claim: Will end Amazon deforestation within 4 years
predictions.quote: Brazil will have zero deforestation by the end of my term.
predictions.outcome_notes: Deforestation reduced but not eliminated

predictions.claim: Brazil GDP growth will exceed 3% in 2023
predictions.quote: We will have 3% growth this year. The economy is recovering.
predictions.outcome_notes: Brazil GDP grew 2.9% in 2023, effectively meeting target

pundits.name: Vladimir Putin
pundits.bio: President of Russia since 1999 (with PM interlude 2008-2012).

predictions.claim: Special military operation in Ukraine will be quick
predictions.quote: The special military operation will achieve its objectives rapidly.
predictions.outcome_notes: War continued for years, major territorial losses in 2022

predictions.claim: Partial mobilization will turn the tide of war
predictions.quote: This mobilization will ensure our victory.
predictions.outcome_notes: Ukraine counteroffensive succeeded, Russia lost Kherson

predictions.claim: Western sanctions will not affect Russian economy
predictions.quote: Sanctions will have minimal impact on our economy.
predictions.outcome_notes: Russian ruble crashed 50%, economy entered recession

pundits.name: Volodymyr Zelensky
pundits.bio: President of Ukraine since 2019. Former actor and comedian.

predictions.claim: Ukraine will win the war by end of 2023
predictions.quote: Next year will bring victory. We will liberate all territories.
predictions.outcome_notes: War continued through 2023, counteroffensive had limited gains

predictions.claim: Summer counteroffensive will break through Russian lines
predictions.quote: The counteroffensive will be successful. We are ready.
predictions.outcome_notes: Counteroffensive stalled, minimal territorial gains

predictions.claim: Kyiv will not fall to Russia
predictions.quote: We are here. We are in Kyiv. We are defending Ukraine.
predictions.outcome_notes: Russia withdrew from Kyiv region by April 2022

pundits.name: Gary Neville
pundits.bio: Former Manchester United defender, Sky Sports pundit. Known for Premier League predictions.

predictions.claim: Manchester City will win 2023-24 Premier League
predictions.quote: City will win the league again. They're too good.
predictions.outcome_notes: Manchester City won their 4th consecutive Premier League title

predictions.claim: Liverpool will win 2022-23 Premier League
predictions.quote: I think Liverpool will be champions this season. They've strengthened well.
predictions.outcome_notes: Liverpool finished 5th, Man City won the title

predictions.claim: Chelsea will challenge for 2021-22 title
predictions.quote: Chelsea are serious contenders. Tuchel has them organized.
predictions.outcome_notes: Chelsea finished 3rd, 19 points behind Man City

predictions.claim: Manchester United will finish in top 4 in 2019-20
predictions.quote: United will get Champions League. They have too much quality.
predictions.outcome_notes: Manchester United finished 3rd after Bruno Fernandes signing

pundits.name: Gary Lineker
pundits.bio: Former England striker. BBC Match of the Day host. Frequent football predictions.

predictions.claim: England will reach 2022 World Cup final
predictions.quote: I think this could be England's year. We can reach the final.
predictions.outcome_notes: England lost to France in quarter-finals

predictions.claim: England will win Euro 2020
predictions.quote: Football's coming home. I genuinely believe we can win it.
predictions.outcome_notes: England lost to Italy on penalties in final

predictions.claim: Arsenal will win 2022-23 Premier League
predictions.quote: Arsenal are going to win the league. They've been outstanding.
predictions.outcome_notes: Arsenal collapsed, Man City won with 89 points

pundits.name: Fabrizio Romano
pundits.bio: Football transfer specialist. Known for 'Here we go' confirmations.

predictions.claim: Mbappe will stay at PSG for 2023-24 season
predictions.quote: Kylian Mbappe will stay at PSG this summer. Here we go confirmed.
predictions.outcome_notes: Mbappe stayed at PSG for 2023-24, moved to Real Madrid in 2024

predictions.claim: Declan Rice will sign for Arsenal
predictions.quote: Declan Rice to Arsenal, here we go! Agreement reached.
predictions.outcome_notes: Rice signed for Arsenal for 105m

predictions.claim: De Jong will join Manchester United in summer 2022
predictions.quote: Barcelona and Man United negotiating De Jong deal. Getting closer.
predictions.outcome_notes: De Jong stayed at Barcelona, no transfer completed

predictions.claim: Mbappe will sign for Real Madrid in summer 2024
predictions.quote: Kylian Mbappe to Real Madrid, here we go! Finally done.
predictions.outcome_notes: Mbappe signed for Real Madrid on free transfer

pundits.name: Recep Tayyip Erdoan
pundits.bio: President of Turkey since 2014. Former Prime Minister (2003-2014).

predictions.claim: Lower interest rates will reduce inflation
predictions.quote: Lower interest rates will bring down inflation. This is economic orthodoxy.
predictions.outcome_notes: Turkish inflation soared to 80% after rate cuts

predictions.claim: Will win first round of 2023 presidential election
predictions.quote: We will win in the first round. The opposition is divided.
predictions.outcome_notes: Erdogan got 49.5%, runoff required (won runoff with 52%)

predictions.claim: Will win runoff election against Kilicdaroglu
predictions.quote: The second round will be our victory.
predictions.outcome_notes: Erdogan won runoff with 52.18%

pundits.name: Xi Jinping
pundits.bio: President of China and General Secretary of CPC since 2012.

predictions.claim: China will be moderately prosperous society by 2021
predictions.quote: By 2021, China will become a moderately prosperous society in all respects.
predictions.outcome_notes: CPC declared goal achieved on 100th anniversary

predictions.claim: COVID will be controlled quickly in Wuhan
predictions.quote: The epidemic can be controlled. We have confidence.
predictions.outcome_notes: COVID became global pandemic, Wuhan locked down for months

predictions.claim: Zero-COVID policy will succeed until herd immunity
predictions.quote: Dynamic zero-COVID is the best approach for China.
predictions.outcome_notes: Zero-COVID abandoned in December 2022 amid protests
